    • simplifyMap

      public static <T, U> Map<T,Object> simplifyMap(Map<T,U> map)
      Simplifies a map of typed values by returning a HashMap of untyped objects. Useful before passing the map to Query.bind(Map)
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the keys in the map
      U - the type of the values in the map
      Parameters:
      map - a Map of typed values
      Returns:
      a Map of keys to untyped objects representing the values in the input map

      Parameters:

      fieldClass - the class of the given field.
      fieldName - the field name.
      Returns:
      the field value.
